article.title: Get up to 60% off print books and 80% off Kindle books during the Amazon Book Sale - Fox News
article.description: Spend less on all your favorite books and eReaders during Amazon’s Book Sale, happening April 23 – 28.

tweet_text:
Massive savings on books! 📚  Up to 80% off Kindle & 60% off print during Amazon's book sale (Apr 23-28).  Will you be stocking up on AI & tech reads? 🤔 #booksale #AmazonDeals

https://www.foxnews.com/deals/amazon-book-sale
